Question: BRvision Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
BRvision Technology Co., Ltd.

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Introducing the new BRvision 360-degree surround view camera system
- Features 4 high-definition cameras for comprehensive vehicle monitoring
- Equipped with advanced image processing technology for seamless real-time stitching and display
- Offers a bird's eye view of the vehicle surroundings to enhance safety and maneuverability
- Designed for easy installation and compatibility with various vehicle models
